languages.text: "Тогда удачи вам с вашими делами, о шерин". {n}От тона Джай во рту становится горько.{/n} "А я отправляюсь решать свои. Великий позволит — быть может, мы встретимся вновь".
"Then good luck with your business, shereen." {n}Jae's tone tastes acrid in the air.{/n} "But I'm off to handle mine. If the Exalted One wills it, maybe we'll meet again."
languages.original_text: "Тогда удачи вам с вашими делами, о шерин". {n}От тона Джай во рту становится горько.{/n} "А я отправляюсь решать свои. Великий позволит — быть может, мы встретимся вновь".

traits.locale_text: "Then good luck with your business, shereen." {n}Jae's tone tastes acrid in the air.{/n} "But I'm off to handle mine. If the Exalted One wills it, maybe we'll meet again."
"Then good luck with your business, shereen." {n}Jae's tone tastes acrid in the air.{/n} "But I'm off to handle mine. If the Exalted One wills it, maybe we'll meet again."

"Then good luck with your business, shereen." {n}Jae's tone tastes acrid in the air.{/n} "But I'm off to handle mine. If the Exalted One wills it, maybe we'll meet again."

languages.text: "Dann viel Glück mit Euren Angelegenheiten, Shereen." {n}Du spürst die Schärfe in Jaes Stimme.{/n} "Aber ich muss mich um meine kümmern. So es der Erhabene will, werden wir uns wiedersehen."
languages.original_text: "Then good luck with your business, shereen." {n}Jae's tone tastes acrid in the air.{/n} "But I'm off to handle mine. If the Exalted One wills it, maybe we'll meet again."

traits.locale_text: "Dann viel Glück mit Euren Angelegenheiten, Shereen." {n}Du spürst die Schärfe in Jaes Stimme.{/n} "Aber ich muss mich um meine kümmern. So es der Erhabene will, werden wir uns wiedersehen."

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, je vous souhaite bonne chance avec vos affaires, shereen, {n}répond Jae sur un ton amer,{/n} mais je vais partir m'occuper des miennes. Si l'Exalté le veut, nos routes se recroiseront peut-être. »
languages.original_text: "Then good luck with your business, shereen." {n}Jae's tone tastes acrid in the air.{/n} "But I'm off to handle mine. If the Exalted One wills it, maybe we'll meet again."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, je vous souhaite bonne chance avec vos affaires, shereen, {n}répond Jae sur un ton amer,{/n} mais je vais partir m'occuper des miennes. Si l'Exalté le veut, nos routes se recroiseront peut-être. »

languages.text: “既然如此，祝你生意顺利，亲爱的。”{n}婕伊的语气充满了辛酸的味道。{/n}“不过，我要去处理我的事情了。如果至高无上的神皇愿意，或许我们还会再次见面。”
languages.original_text: "Then good luck with your business, shereen." {n}Jae's tone tastes acrid in the air.{/n} "But I'm off to handle mine. If the Exalted One wills it, maybe we'll meet again."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，祝你生意顺利，亲爱的。”{n}婕伊的语气充满了辛酸的味道。{/n}“不过，我要去处理我的事情了。如果至高无上的神皇愿意，或许我们还会再次见面。”

languages.text: «Pues buena suerte con sus asuntos, shereen». {n}Jae adopta un tono acre.{/n} «Yo tengo que irme a resolver los míos. Si el Exaltado quiere, tal vez volvamos a encontrarnos».
languages.original_text: "Then good luck with your business, shereen." {n}Jae's tone tastes acrid in the air.{/n} "But I'm off to handle mine. If the Exalted One wills it, maybe we'll meet again."

traits.locale_text: «Pues buena suerte con sus asuntos, shereen». {n}Jae adopta un tono acre.{/n} «Yo tengo que irme a resolver los míos. Si el Exaltado quiere, tal vez volvamos a encontrarnos».

languages.text: 「じゃあ、がんばってくれ、シャリーン」{n}ジェイの声音が苦く響く。{/n}「けど、あたしはあたしのことをしに行くよ。エグザルテッド・ワンが望むなら、きっとまた会えるさ」
languages.original_text: "Then good luck with your business, shereen." {n}Jae's tone tastes acrid in the air.{/n} "But I'm off to handle mine. If the Exalted One wills it, maybe we'll meet again."

traits.locale_text: 「じゃあ、がんばってくれ、シャリーン」{n}ジェイの声音が苦く響く。{/n}「けど、あたしはあたしのことをしに行くよ。エグザルテッド・ワンが望むなら、きっとまた会えるさ」

languages.text: "O işlerde sana bol şans şirinim." {n}Âdeta Jae'ın sesindeki acının tadını alıyorsun.{/n} "Benim kendi işim var. Görkemli izin verirse belki tekrar görüşürüz."
languages.original_text: "Then good luck with your business, shereen." {n}Jae's tone tastes acrid in the air.{/n} "But I'm off to handle mine. If the Exalted One wills it, maybe we'll meet again."
